info.name: Comic Mode
info.summary: Open your picture folder in comic mode
info.description: When you read comics on nextcloud, you may need this plugin to help you read better. We provide a more user-friendly UI interface, allowing you to read like on a comic site. We also support the automatic recognition of comic sequences, and automatically analyze the previous chapter to the next chapter to provide you with a detailed reading experience.
info.author: lixiaofei
